Summary Note:
Beatrix Gertrud Lechner and the RM crossed paths at a mutual friend's dinner party in Vienna. They discovered they had many common acquaintances and decided to explore business opportunities together.
Beatrix Gertrud Lechner is a 29 year old and comes from Austria.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons she decided to join.
Family Background: Beatrix Gertrud Lechner is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
In 2015, Beatrix finished her secondary school education at Walser Gymnasium.
She then attended University of Vienna, which she graduated in 2019.
In 2023, she received extra education and graduated from Graz University of Technology with an additional degree.
Occupation History:
Beatrix Gertrud Lechner is a 29 year old Portfolio Manager from Austria.
In 2020, Beatrix Gertrud Lechner started working as a Stockbroker at Conwert Immobilien Invest AG, marking the beginning of her successful career.
She then transitioned to Immofinanz AG as a Portfolio Manager, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 2023 to 2025.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 20000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
Client does not have any properties.
In addition to her career success, she also received an inheritance of 1780000 EUR from her late grandmother, a renowned Hedge Fund Manager, in 2019.
Client Summary: In summary, Beatrix has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
